name: LD40 - Digit Attack
description:
A LD40 submission.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/digit-attack

Objective

Given a hand of three cards the player places them into the board to optimally decrease the opponents attack power. The game is over when the player has no more health or the enemy is unable to attack.

Cards

Cards are categorized into either Attack (sword) or Heal (heart) cards. 
On playing a card, the tile assumes it's type. Effects are played out according to the tiles type.

Tiles

Attack tiles decrease numbers.

Heal tiles increase the players life.

Rounds

Every round the amount of empty tiles increases on the board, decreasing card efficacy.
